description: Two in-person tests (Week 7: 30%, Week 10: 20%) assessing lecture content via multiple-choice, short answer, and long response questions. Conducted during tutorials via invigilated online platform with feedback provided.

Term-long group task involving experiments to diagnose a metabolic condition. Includes a 4-page diagnosis report (15%), experimental design presentation (10%), and individual reflections on teamwork (5%). Scaffolded with draft feedback in Weeks 3 and 7.
Week 4 practical class quiz with individual (15%) and group (5%) components. Involves data analysis, graphing, and biochemical calculations. Includes immediate peer feedback during group component.
